o3smeasures.plugin.chart

Class BarChart

  • java.lang.Object
    • o3smeasures.plugin.chart.BarChart

  • public class BarChart
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that implements a Bar chart with the results of the items measured in the plugin, separeted in internal quality indicators. See in http://repositorio.ufla.br/handle/1/10561.
    Since:
    16/04/2017
    Author:
    Mariana Azevedo
